mapper.sql: id, userName, pwd, nickName, state, loginCount, loginTime, createTime, updateTime, superAdmin
mapper.select:
select
from sys_user where userName=#{username} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, userName, pwd, nickName, state, loginCount, loginTime, createTime, updateTime, superAdmin) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logincount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{superadmin,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update sys_user
userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
loginCount = #{logincount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
loginTime = #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
superAdmin = #{superadmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
